SEARCH
Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.entity

Class MailEntity

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.entity.MailEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class MailEntity extends Object implements Serializable
The MessageEntity class represents the "message" table in the database. Each instance of this class corresponds to a single row in the table.
See Also:
